option.name: put_viewport
option.long: Move window to a certain viewport

option.name: put_viewport_1_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 1

option.name: put_viewport_2_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 2

option.name: put_viewport_3_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 3

option.name: put_viewport_4_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 4

option.name: put_viewport_5_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 5

option.name: put_viewport_6_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 6

option.name: put_viewport_7_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 7

option.name: put_viewport_8_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 8

option.name: put_viewport_9_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 9

option.name: put_viewport_10_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 10

option.name: put_viewport_11_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 11

option.name: put_viewport_12_key
option.long: Move window to viewport 12

option.name: put_viewport_left_key
option.long: Move window to the viewport on the left

option.name: put_viewport_right_key
option.long: Move window to the viewport on the right

option.name: put_viewport_up_key
option.long: Move window to the viewport on the top

option.name: put_viewport_down_key
option.long: Move window to the viewport on the bottom

option.name: put_center_key
option.long: Move window to the center

option.name: put_center_button
option.long: Move window to the center

option.name: put_left_key
option.long: Move window to the left edge

option.name: put_left_button
option.long: Move window to the left edge

option.name: put_right_key
option.long: Move window to the right edge

option.name: put_right_button
option.long: Move window to the right edge

option.name: put_top_key
option.long: Move window to the top edge

option.name: put_top_button
option.long: Move window to the top edge

option.name: put_bottom_key
option.long: Move window to the bottom edge

option.name: put_bottom_button
option.long: Move window to the bottom edge

option.name: put_topleft_key
option.long: Move window to the top left corner

option.name: put_topleft_button
option.long: Move window to the top left corner

option.name: put_topright_key
option.long: Move window to the top right corner

option.name: put_topright_button
option.long: Move window to the top right corner

option.name: put_bottomleft_key
option.long: Move window to the bottom left corner

option.name: put_bottomleft_button
option.long: Move window to the bottom left corner

option.name: put_bottomright_key
option.long: Move window to the bottom right corner

option.name: put_bottomright_button
option.long: Move window to the bottom right corner

option.name: put_empty_center_key
option.long: Move window to the center

option.name: put_empty_center_button
option.long: Move window to the center

option.name: put_empty_left_key
option.long: Move window to the left edge

option.name: put_empty_left_button
option.long: Move window to the left edge

option.name: put_empty_right_key
option.long: Move window to the right edge

option.name: put_empty_right_button
option.long: Move window to the right edge

option.name: put_empty_top_key
option.long: Move window to the top edge

option.name: put_empty_top_button
option.long: Move window to the top edge

option.name: put_empty_bottom_key
option.long: Move window to the bottom edge

option.name: put_empty_bottom_button
option.long: Move window to the bottom edge

option.name: put_empty_topleft_key
option.long: Move window to the top left corner

option.name: put_empty_topleft_button
option.long: Move window to the top left corner

option.name: put_empty_topright_key
option.long: Move window to the top right corner

option.name: put_empty_topright_button
option.long: Move window to the top right corner

option.name: put_empty_bottomleft_key
option.long: Move window to the bottom left corner

option.name: put_empty_bottomleft_button
option.long: Move window to the bottom left corner

option.name: put_empty_bottomright_key
option.long: Move window to the bottom right corner

option.name: put_empty_bottomright_button
option.long: Move window to the bottom right corner

option.name: put_restore_key
option.long: Move window to the last position

option.name: put_restore_button
option.long: Move window to the last position

option.name: put_pointer_key
option.long: Move window to the pointer position

option.name: put_pointer_button
option.long: Move window to the pointer position

option.name: put_next_output_key
option.long: Move window to the next output device

option.name: put_next_output_button
option.long: Move window to the next output device

option.name: put_previous_output_key
option.long: Move window to the previous output device

option.name: put_previous_output_button
option.long: Move window to the previous output device

option.name: put_put
option.long: Move window arbitrarily by passing x, y and type.

option.name: pad_left
option.long: Number of pixels from the left edge where the window will come to rest

option.name: pad_right
option.long: Number of pixels from the right edge where the window will come to rest

option.name: pad_top
option.long: Number of pixels from the top edge where the window will come to rest

option.name: pad_bottom
option.long: Number of pixels from the bottom edge where the window will come to rest

option.name: unfocus_window
option.long: Unfocus windows that are moved off the viewport

option.name: window_center
option.long: Put pointer uses the center of the window

option.name: avoid_offscreen
option.long: Avoids putting window borders offscreen

option.name: speed
option.long: Animation speed

option.name: timestep
option.long: Animation timestep
